name: AutoCAD Ecscad Project Backup File
summary: Learn about .EZP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: AutoCAD Ecscad is localized in German.
NOTE: Autodesk AutoCAD Ecscad was discontinued in 2013.

description: CAD project created by AutoCAD Ecscad, a program used for designing electrical circuits; stores a backup of a CAD project in a compressed .ZIP format; can be used for archiving projects on backup media such as CDs and backup drives.
